name: Kinotrope
description:
Hey, Welcome.

You will be in a steampunk world with where you have to escape..

You will possess lemming to complete the mission to finish the game.

This is our game for the UE4 Jam 2019. We were 3-4 members to make this in 5 days.

Thanks to : Jack Filipe Edgar and Marcel.

Thanks for playing this game we hope you had fun.
